name: file-uploader-component
description: A reactjs, angular and vuejs component of file uploader.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run file2variable && tsc -p src && tsc -p demo && lessc src/file-uploader.less > dist/file-uploader.css && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.js && npm run clean-rev && npm run cleancss && rev-static --config demo/rev-static.config.js
scripts.lint: tslint "src/**/*.tsx" "demo/**/*.tsx" "src/**/*.ts" "demo/**/*.ts" "spec/**/*.ts" && stylelint "src/*.less" --syntax less && npm run standard
scripts.cleancss: cleancss -o dist/file-uploader.min.css dist/file-uploader.css && cleancss -o demo/index.bundle.css dist/file-uploader.min.css ./node_modules/github-fork-ribbon-css/gh-fork-ribbon.css
scripts.file2variable: file2variable-cli src/vue.template.html -o src/vue-variables.ts --html-minify --base src && file2variable-cli src/angular.template.html -o src/angular-variables.ts --html-minify --base src

author: York Yao
